parameters.name: Subscriptions
parameters.query:
summarize by subscriptionId
| project value = strcat("/subscriptions/", subscriptionId), label = subscriptionId, selected = iff(subscriptionId =~ '{DefaultSubscription_Internal}', true, false)

parameters.name: Workspaces
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| project id, selected = iff(id =~ todynamic('{DefaultSubscription_Internal}').ws, true, false), custId= properties.customerId

# Get Started #

-------------------------

Welcome to the Virtual Machine Uptime workbook. This workbook is designed to ease the reporting on virtual machine uptime by VM, by Day and using a list of VM in the given time frame. You can select single or multiple virtual machine, subscriptions and workspaces. You can also select a time range with the most common pattern or custom interval as well as the TimeZone adjustment (which can be easily customized to include more).

## Requirements ##

* A [Log Analytics workspace.](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/design-logs-deployment?WT.mc_id=Portal-fx)

* Integration of Azure Activity into a Log analytics workspace. If you are unfamiliar with how to [Collect and analyze Azure activity logs in Log Analytics workspace in Azure Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/activity-log-collect)

If you're unfamiliar with Azure Activity, see [Azure Activity log](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/activity-log)

### ⚠️ Data from Azure Activity, which is necessary for this workbook to work properly, was not found in the selected workspace. --- Please select another workspace or check out the detailed documentation on how to collect Azure Activity logs in Azure Monitor at [this](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/activity-log-collect#collecting-activity-log) link.

parameters.name: Servers
parameters.query:
AzureActivity
| where ResourceProvider == "Microsoft.Compute"
| where _ResourceId contains "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines"
| where (indexof(_ResourceId,"/",0,-1,9)) == -1
| distinct Resource
| order by Resource asc

content.query:
let _now = toscalar(now());
let defaultStopVM = AzureActivity
| where ResourceProvider == "Microsoft.Compute"
| where _ResourceId contains "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines"
| where (indexof(_ResourceId,"/",0,-1,9)) == -1
| where Resource in ({Servers})
| extend TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated + ({TimeZone}*1h)
| distinct _ResourceId
| extend stopTime=_now;
let startVM=AzureActivity
| where ResourceProvider == "Microsoft.Compute"
| where _ResourceId contains "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines"
| where (indexof(_ResourceId,"/",0,-1,9)) == -1
| where Resource in ({Servers}) 
| where OperationName startswith "start virtual" 
| where ActivityStatusValue == "Succeeded"
| extend TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated + ({TimeZone}*1h)
| project startTime=TimeGenerated, Resource, _ResourceId;
let stopVM=AzureActivity
| where ResourceProvider == "Microsoft.Compute"
| where _ResourceId contains "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" 
| where (indexof(_ResourceId,"/",0,-1,9)) == -1
| where Resource in ({Servers})
| where OperationName startswith "deallocate virtual" 
| where ActivityStatusValue == "Succeeded"
| extend TimeGenerated = TimeGenerated + ({TimeZone}*1h)
| project stopTime=TimeGenerated, Resource, _ResourceId
| union defaultStopVM;
startVM
| join kind=leftouter (stopVM) on $left._ResourceId == $right._ResourceId
| extend isAfterStart = iff(startTime > stopTime, 0, 1)
| where isAfterStart == 1
| summarize arg_min(stopTime, *) by startTime, Resource
| summarize arg_min(startTime, *) by stopTime, Resource
| order by Resource desc, startTime desc
| project Resource, uptimeMins = datetime_diff('minute',stopTime,startTime)//, uptimeHours = datetime_diff('hour',stopTime,startTime)
//| summarize totUptimeMinByVM = sum(uptimeHours) by Resource
| summarize totUptimeMinByVM = sum(uptimeMins) by Resource
content.title: Total uptime in minutes by Virtual Machine
